info.title: TrailService API
info.description: Microservice for managing hiking trails in a wellbeing application

post.description: Authenticate user with external API and create session
Logout user - client should discard token
Test credentials without creating a session

Register a new user (using external authentication)
Note: The external API doesn't have registration, so this just creates a local user
after verifying credentials are valid

get.description:
Get all public trails with optional filtering
# Public users: see only public trails
# Authenticated users: see public trails + their own private trails

schema.title: Response Get Trails Api V1 Trails Get
Response Create Trail Api V1 Trails Post

get.description:
Get detailed information about a specific trail
# Public: can view public trails only
# Authenticated: can view public trails + own private trails

schema.title: Response Get Trail Api V1 Trails  Trail Id  Get
Response Update Trail Api V1 Trails  Trail Id  Put

get.description:
Get all points for a specific trail
# Public: can view points of public trails
# Authenticated: can view points of public trails + own private trails

schema.title: Response Get Trail Points Api V1 Trails  Trail Id  Points Get

post.description: Add a new point to a trail

get.description: Get all countries with optional filtering - PUBLIC ENDPOINT

schema.title: Response Get Countries Api V1 Countries Get

get.description: Get cities for a specific country - PUBLIC ENDPOINT

schema.title: Response Get Cities By Country Api V1 Countries  Country Id  Cities Get

get.description: Get all locations with filtering - PUBLIC ENDPOINT

schema.title: Response Get Locations Api V1 Locations Get

get.description: Get location by ID - PUBLIC ENDPOINT

schema.title: Response Get Location Api V1 Locations  Location Id  Get

get.description: Get current user's profile  - PROTECTED ENDPOINT

schema.title: Response Get Current User Profile Api V1 Users Me Get
Response Get Users Api V1 Users Get

get.description:
Get user by ID
# Public: basic info only (username, public stats)
# Self/Admin: full info

schema.title: Response Get User By Id Api V1 Users  User Id  Get
Response Update User Role Api V1 Users  User Id  Role Put

get.description:
Get trails created by a specific user
# Public: public trails only
# Self/Admin: can include private trails if requested

parameters.name: include_private

schema.description: Include private trails (admin or owner only)
schema.title: Include Private

parameters.description: Include private trails (admin or owner only)

schema.title: Response Get User Trails Api V1 Users  User Id  Trails Get

BearerAuth.description: Enter session token obtained from authentication

tags.name: Trails
tags.description: Trail management operations. Create, read, update, and delete hiking trails.

tags.name: Locations
tags.description: Location management for trails (countries, cities, specific locations).

tags.name: Health
tags.description: Health check and service status endpoints.
